creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
when an xhtml document is edited with oneform, the heading reads
"edit-news-properties". it looks like this buglet crept in when the news module
was introduced.

looks like this is what happened:

--- lenya/trunk/src/modules/editors/usecases/forms/oneform.jx	2007/02/21
16:01:52	510073
+++ lenya/trunk/src/modules/editors/usecases/forms/oneform.jx	2007/04/10
15:13:14	527153
@@ -24,7 +24,7 @@
   xmlns:cinclude="http://apache.org/cocoon/include/1.0"
   >
   
-  <page:title><i18n:text>Edit</i18n:text></page:title>
+  <page:title><i18n:text>edit-news-properties</i18n:text></page:title>
   <page:body>

i could just revert this chunk, but it might be wrong for news then...

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: I reverted the commit, thanks for reporting!
